page.title: 04STOTTESDON EMPLOYMENT- CONT.
page.content: About 1/3 of the working population work at home, & another 1/3{travel}10 mls or less to work each day. About 1/4 travel 10-15 mls, the distance to the nearest towns. Few travel over 30 mls away daily, but some go that far once or twice a week. There is no daily public transport so all journeys to work are by car. The occupations of these people are very varied, eg. industrial & clerical jobs, medical & social work & teaching. {The vicar}working from Stottesdon also serves Farlow, Cleeton & Silvington. Few people in the block are long term {sick}or{unemployed.}Few{married women work full time, though many have part time or casual jobs. A significant number are{retired,}but far from idle. Few over 16's are full time{students. None is at university; some go to Ludlow VI Form College or other C.F.Es
